Package view.graphic

Class GraphicGameplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • view.graphic.GraphicGameplay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class GraphicGameplay
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    GraphicGameplay draws and manage the graphic part of a zen l'initie game
    Author:
    Godet Louis-Xavier
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • iniStaticInformation

        public void iniStaticInformation​(java.lang.String gameName,
                                 java.lang.String playerOneName,
                                 java.lang.String playerTwoName,
                                 java.lang.String pawnPlayerOne,
                                 java.lang.String pawnPlayerTwo)
        Initializes the static information(gived by parameters) about players of the zen l'initie game
        Parameters:
        gameName - : the name of the game
        playerOneName - : the name of the first player
        playerTwoName - : the name of the second player
        pawnPlayerOne - : the type of pawn owned by the first player
        pawnPlayerTwo - : the type of pawn owned by the second player

      • updateDynamicInformation

        public void updateDynamicInformation​(java.lang.String currentPlayerName,
                                     int nbPawnsPlayerOne,
                                     int nbPawnsPlayerTwo,
                                     int nbChainedPlayerOne,
                                     int nbChainedPlayerTwo)
        Updates the dynamic information(gived by parameters) about players of the zen l'initie game
        Parameters:
        currentPlayerName - : the name of the current player who must play his turn
        nbPawnsPlayerOne - : the number of pawns owned by the first player
        nbPawnsPlayerTwo - : the number of pawns owned by the second player
        nbChainedPlayerOne - : the number of pawns owned by the first player which participate to the chain
        nbChainedPlayerTwo - : the number of pawns owned by the second player which participate to the chain
